item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

I would suggest lowering that actionTimer or the experience gained. 53 is like 30-45 seconds. They can just log out, log back in, hit the haybale. Log out, log in, hit they haybale, repeat for loads of experience. So I wouldnâ€™t suggest putting that in

item.title: This
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

you add that in case 132, but you have to put this:

if (objectID == *haybaleID*) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You train Def !"); actionTimer = 53; setAnimation(1978); addSkillXP((5000*playerLevel[1]), 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }
